Syndra

Try the game! Lore ph

My small simulation of Syndra was programmed in Gamemaker Studios 2 during summer of 2019. All assets are created by myself after learning Gamemaker for about one month. The entire project was completed within around 3 weeks. The game implements the use of the mouse, right click, q, w, e, r, and s.

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 canvas.
